title: Are You Ready to Enter Leila’s Mind and Journey into Her Past?
description: Hello, I’m Eser Kaya, I’m part of the Ubik Studios team developing Leila. I’d like to tell you a little bit about the world of Leila that you’ll be diving into. Leila puts you inside the mind of a middle-aged woman and lets you wander there. You are allowed to enter her mind and you […] The post Are You Ready to Enter Leila’s Mind and Journey into Her Past? appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: johns
